title: Blue Client
body:
Hello, 

I noticed yesterday that whenever I would log in to league it would be normal until I actually got into my account and then the client would be all blue instead of the normal one and I am unable to utilize any of the chat functions. I thought this was a weird Halloween thing Riot was doing, but whenever I logged in today it is still doing it. Does anyone know what is going on?

replies.body: I'm not sure I understand the issue, and haven't heard of a 'blue client.'  Can you provide some screenshots of what you're seeing exactly, or even any error messages that might come up?  Happy to look into this with you!

Thanks for the screenshot!  You may have some old and corrupt files that need a clean up!  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a reinstall to restore your client to a fresh state.  That should get you fixed up!
